website_summaries.verdict: By far the creamiest hemp seed we've tried. The flavor, texture, and blendability make this brand worth investing the extra dollars into.
pros: The subtle golden color and extra oil in these hemp seeds made them stand out
Not white and dry like those from competitors
The seeds are soft and creamy
If you're looking to blend the seeds into hemp milk, these are the best choice
cons: Sits at a slightly higher price point than it's competitors

customer_reviews.title: Product contains many small rocks. Warning sticker on back ...
customer_reviews.text: Product contains many small rocks. Warning sticker on back says "This product contains lead and other chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer, birth defects, and other reproductive harm.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: These are the best hemp seeds I've ever tasted
customer_reviews.text: These are the best hemp seeds I've ever tasted. They're way creamier and fresher tasting than other brands. I make a hemp seed milk shake that is absolutely addicting. First, I blend one glass cold water with a little ice and 3 medjool dates. Then, I add 4 heaping Tbsp hemp seeds, 1/4 to 1/2 tsp Celtic sea salt, 2 Tbsp coconut sugar, 1 Tbsp raw cacao powder, and 1 tsp vanilla extract. Blend again and be amazed every time! Nothing else tastes this good!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Without question the best hemp seed I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Without question the best hemp seed I have ever tried. Moist and buttery Raw Food Word hemp seed is much a nutty bread in flavor and texture. All the other brands I have tried are just plain dry and bland. The energy boost I get from adding this product to my morning eggs and salads is so very satisfying. Try it out, I think you will end up dumping your old brand right in the trash, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: JWCorbett

customer_reviews.title: Too many hard hulls.
customer_reviews.text: I was willing to pay the higher price for this, hoping it would be better. Unfortunately, it has as much or more of the hard hulls as all the other brands I've tried. I like to eat the little "nuts" out of hand or with a spoon, but the hulls make this very unpleasant. I have to put them into a processor and make them into a "butter" before I can use them, and it's not what I wanted. I won't be buying any hemp seeds again. $13. a pound for hulls is just too much, on top of it all.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLiberty

customer_reviews.title: Ineligible for returns
customer_reviews.text: Gave 3 stars because of the return policy. I ordered the wrong product. I was looking for ground hemp seed but was not paying enough attention, and ordered whole seed. What made me be stingy with stars is that this product is ineligible for return. I thought I read everything about this product, (but it’s obvious that I didn’t, because whole seeds, lol) but didn’t see anything about the return policy. I have since replaced it with a ground product, so I’m sure this is a fine product. I’ll try to resell it locally.
customer_reviews.author: Pleasebearwithme

customer_reviews.title: Great nutrition.. but a few hulls in the old teeth((*-*))
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great.. awesome nutrients of course.. I did find there are quite a few hulls.. and thats the bitter part. I just got some manitoba harvest, and they look like less hulls..
customer_reviews.author: ddsue75

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the sweet nutty flavor and rich and creamy taste ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the sweet nutty flavor and rich and creamy taste when blended. This goes very well in my smoothies. It stays fresh in the refrigerator too for a good while. It's the best hemp protein I have had and will continue to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Diwika

customer_reviews.title: Very nice seeds.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I didn't realize before that there is a difference in healthy quality in hemp seeds etc. I read some reviews first and read about the nutty aroma and taste and sure enough these seeds were soft and full of nutty aroma. Been adding them to my daily banana & berries smoothie. I don't know about the micro breakdown etc but my first bag bought at a big box store the seeds definitely were not soft or nutty in fragrance. Very nice seeds...
customer_reviews.author: James Rougeau

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that I got 2 samples with my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I got 2 samples with my bag of hemp seeds and that they send a hand written letter with them thank u!!!!! Its my first time eatting hemp seeds since I'm starting a diet for my wedding I herd so much about how healthy they are for u so I am going to be using them in my herbalife shakes for now on. And sticking with this company since they care enough to send more then the order to their buyers it goes a long way with the note too 😊
customer_reviews.author: Emily Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Seed shells galore
customer_reviews.text: This hemp seed is usually worth the extra money. Not sure if I got a bad batch or some old stock before they figured out how to get the seed shells out but it has more seed shells than the brands that are half the price. I spent a lot of time picking out the shells, still didn't get them all. Very disappointed and cannot return. I would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fresh and great for blending
customer_reviews.text: I blend these into smoothies and love them. They smell very fresh. I also blend them with water and agave syrup to make a nutrient dense milk for baking. And lastly, I blend them with other nuts and seeds, dates, cacao powder, and maca and camu camu powder to make energy bars. Love these hemp seeds!
customer_reviews.author: 1ManArmy

customer_reviews.title: Great on Salads
customer_reviews.text: I like these hemp seeds. They taste nutty and go great on salads. I like to keep them refrigerated though I'm not sure if that is necessary. Comes in nice resealable packaging. Also, I've ordered these twice so far and both times they came with a small sample of curry bites. Hemp seeds are a great source of protein.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the taste
customer_reviews.text: As a vegetarian I need creative ways to get fatty acids and other nutrients. I researched hemp seeds and this was my first try, so I can't compare it to other brands. I like the taste a lot. It's buttery and very "plant-like". By that, I mean it tasted a bit like seaweed (but not salt water). I don't know how else to describe it! It was not a bad taste, just something different. I have eaten it directly with a spoon. So far, I'm really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: norolimfrodo

customer_reviews.title: Super food
customer_reviews.text: These seeds are a great addition to my salads. I bought them because they are a super food high in protein and promote energy. They definitely added the kick I need to my salads.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Parker

customer_reviews.title: I just LOVE LOVE LOVE hemp seed.
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE LOVE LOVE hemp seed. I wish it was legal to grow in the USA so it was more affordable. It is great on salads, in smoothies, on yogurt, in pesto - the possibilities are endless. Just read the label and see how nutritious they are. They have a perfect balance of Omega 3's and 6's for the human body. I always keep a bag handy in the freezer. They are yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Keygoddess

customer_reviews.title: Great source of omega 3
customer_reviews.text: These are great hemp seeds. I rotate the ones I buy from amazon to give the buyers their business. Raw food world has a variety of other raw treats as well. They blend up easily with greens, berries and what ever else I may put it with them in my vita mix in the morning or afternoons. I have been drinking green blended drinks for almost 10 years and I feel great for 59. I highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Salubrious

customer_reviews.title: This brand has nailed it
customer_reviews.text: Everything you want in a hemp seed pack (I've tried them all). Great fresh flavor, easy to reseal, and I've never gotten a hull. I add theses to something almost everyday. My favorite is grinding it up in a coffee grinder with cinnamon for a super yummy and warm nut butter (seed butter?)
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Lead warning?!
customer_reviews.text: Came with warning may contain lead. Should be disclosed before purchase. Mistake?

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and Health Benefits
customer_reviews.text: These are great, have apparently lowered my cholesterol, and have a nice texture and taste. Good value. They don't stick to your teeth and gums as much as chia or flax seeds. I will definitely purchase more when mine runs out. Nice size bag.

I put them in yogurt, on salads, in oatmeal, in snack mixes and eat them by the mouthful. They have a nutty flavor and the natural oils make them 'snack like'. Add a little salt (bad i know) and you have your self a healthy snack to satisfy potato chip cravings.
